title: I am not receiving some messages, I just moved over from iphone back to android.
content: I am on Verizon and have been for the past 3-4 years. I switched to iphone then back and now I cannot receive text messages from certain iPhone users. We have created new chats as wel,l every other text message is received and sent. I have gone to apples website and removed my phone number from imessage and restarted my device as well as made sure it is fully updated.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
